ol.li:
SHALL satisfy: Patient awareness SHALL contain exactly one participant / participantRole / id, which SHALL have exactly one value, which SHALL also be present in ClinicalDocument / recordTarget / patientRole / id. (CONF-183)
[OCL]: self.participantRole.id->one(id : datatypes::II | not id.root.oclIsUndefined()) -- TODO compare with ClinicalDocument/recordTarget/patientRole/id
[CDA] Contains [1..1] participantRole, where its type is CDA Participant Role

[CCD] SHALL satisfy: Patient awareness SHALL contain exactly one participant / participantRole / id, which SHALL have exactly one value, which SHALL also be present in ClinicalDocument / recordTarget / patientRole / id. (CONF-183)
[OCL]: self.participantRole.id->one(id : datatypes::II | not id.root.oclIsUndefined()) -- TODO compare with ClinicalDocument/recordTarget/patientRole/id
